abstract: Security guards at Little Rock Air Force Base shoot and critically wound a civilian who drove his SUV over a curb near base's main gate.
lead_paragraph: Guards shot and critically wounded a civilian outside the sprawling Little Rock Air Force Base on Monday after the man drove his S.U.V. over a curb near the main gate.

headline.main: Arkansas: Man Trying to Enter Military Base Is Shot
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Man Shot at Military Base

snippet: Guards shot and critically wounded a civilian outside the sprawling Little Rock Air Force Base on Monday after the man drove his S.U.V. over a curb near the main gate.
